name: Infinity Blade Project
description:
For one of my final university modules, I decided to create a level from the infinity blade asset packs, whilst incorporating some of my own models such as barrels, paddling boat etc. The game-play revolves around completely various puzzles to return relics to the castle. 
Level created in UE4.18, assets modeled in Autodesk Maya 2018, textured in Substance Painter 2.
